scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run format
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish && git add -A && git commit -m 'Release v$(npm version)' && git push origin main
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git add -A && git commit -m 'Release v$(npm version)' && git push origin main
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git add -A && git commit -m 'Release v$(npm version)' && git push origin main
